desc.zh-Hans:
重庆轨道交通（Chongqing Rail Transit，CRT）是服务于中国重庆主城都市区境内的城市轨道交通系统。其第一条线路于2005年6月18日开通试运营，成为中国内地第九座、西部地区第一座开通城市轨道交通的城市。

截至2023年2月，重庆轨道交通已开通11条线路，运营里程501千米。其中，1、4、5、6、9、10号线、环线、国博线为地铁系统，2、3号线为单轨系统（跨座式单轨），江跳线为市域（郊）铁路。

截至2023年3月，重庆轨道交通在建线路共13条。

2022年，重庆轨道交通年客运量为9.11亿人次。截至2023年5月，重庆轨道交通日最高客运量为2023年4月30日的471.9万人次。
desc.en:
Chongqing Rail Transit (CRT) is an urban rail transit system serving the metropolitan area of Chongqing, China. Its first line opened for trial operation on June 18, 2005, becoming the ninth city in Chinese mainland and the first city in the western region to open urban rail transit.

As of February 2023, Chongqing Rail Transit has opened 11 lines with an operating mileage of 501 kilometers. Among them, Lines 1, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10, Ring Line and Guobo Line are subway systems, Lines 2 and 3 are monorail systems (straddle monorail), and Jiang Jumper Line is urban (suburban) railways.

As of March 2023, Chongqing Rail Transit has a total of 13 lines under construction.

In 2022, Chongqing Rail Transit will carry 911 million passengers annually. As of May 2023, the highest daily passenger traffic of Chongqing Rail Transit was 4.719 million on April 30, 2023.
